mapper.sql: LEFT OUTER JOIN COMM_TBL b ON a.fuel_cat_cd = b.comm_no AND b.param_value = 'FUEL_CAT' LEFT OUTER JOIN COMM_TBL c ON a.origin_cntry_cd = c.comm_no AND c.param_value = 'COUNTRY' LEFT OUTER JOIN COMM_TBL d ON a.vol_unit_cd = d.comm_no AND d.param_value = 'VOL_UNIT' LEFT OUTER JOIN COMM_TBL e ON a.item_stts_cd = e.comm_no AND e.param_value = 'FUEL_ITEM_STTS' LEFT OUTER JOIN TB_ATCH_FILE_MST f ON a.fuel_id = f.ref_id AND f.system_id = 'PRODUCT_S'

AND ( a.fuel_cd LIKE CONCAT('%', #{searchCondition}, '%') -- 유류코드 OR a.fuel_nm LIKE CONCAT('%', #{searchCondition}, '%') -- 유류명칭 OR b.comm_name LIKE CONCAT ('%', #{searchCondition}, '%' ) -- 유류종류 OR c.comm_name LIKE CONCAT ('%', #{searchCondition}, '%') -- 원산지국가 )
mapper.select:
SELECT ROW_NUMBER() OVER (ORDER BY a.reg_dtime ASC) AS rownm ,a.fuel_id ,a.fuel_cd ,a.fuel_nm ,b.comm_name AS fuel_cat_nm /* 유류종류 명칭 */ ,c.comm_name AS origin_cntry_nm /* 원산지 국가 명칭 */ ,a.base_unit_prc ,a.curr_stock_vol ,a.safe_stock_vol ,d.comm_name AS vol_unit_nm /* 유류단위 명칭 */ ,e.comm_name AS item_stts_nm /* 재고상태 명칭 */ ,a.reg_dtime ,a.upd_dtime ,a.use_yn ,f.str_file_nm /* 서버 파일 이미지 */ FROM TB_OIL_MST a
WHERE 1=1
AND f.use_yn = 'Y' ORDER BY ROW_NUMBER() OVER (ORDER BY a.reg_dtime ASC) DESC
LIMIT #{startRow}, #{limit}

SELECT COUNT(a.fuel_id) FROM TB_OIL_MST a
WHERE 1 = 1
AND f.use_yn = 'Y'

SELECT a.fuel_id ,a.fuel_cd ,a.fuel_nm ,a.fuel_cat_cd ,fnc_get_commnm(a.fuel_cat_cd) AS fuel_cat_nm /* 유류종류 명칭 */ ,a.origin_cntry_cd ,fnc_get_commnm(a.origin_cntry_cd) AS origin_cntry_nm /* 원산지 국가 명칭 */ ,a.base_unit_prc ,a.curr_stock_vol ,a.safe_stock_vol ,a.vol_unit_cd ,fnc_get_commnm(a.vol_unit_cd) AS vol_unit_nm /* 유류단위 명칭 */ ,a.item_stts_cd ,fnc_get_commnm(a.item_stts_cd) AS item_stts_nm /* 재고상태 명칭 */ ,a.reg_dtime ,a.reg_id ,fnc_get_usernm(a.reg_id) AS reg_nm ,a.upd_dtime ,a.upd_id ,fnc_get_usernm(a.upd_id) AS upd_nm ,a.use_yn ,b.api_grv ,b.sulfur_p_cnt ,b.flash_pnt ,b.viscosity ,b.density_15c ,b.fuel_memo ,c.file_id ,c.system_id ,c.str_file_nm FROM TB_OIL_MST a LEFT OUTER JOIN TB_OIL_MST_DETAIL b ON a.fuel_id = b.fuel_id LEFT OUTER JOIN TB_ATCH_FILE_MST c ON a.fuel_id = c.ref_id AND c.system_id IN ('PRODUCT_M', 'PRODUCT_S') WHERE 1=1 AND a.fuel_id = #{fuelId} AND c.use_yn = 'Y'
mapper.update: UPDATE TB_OIL_MST SET fuel_nm = #{fuelNm}, fuel_cat_cd = #{fuelCatCd}, origin_cntry_cd = #{originCntryCd}, base_unit_prc = #{baseUnitPrc}, curr_stock_vol = #{currStockVol}, safe_stock_vol = #{safeStockVol}, vol_unit_cd = #{volUnitCd}, item_stts_cd = #{itemSttsCd}, use_yn = #{useYn}, upd_dtime = CURRENT_TIMESTAMP, upd_id = #{updId} WHERE fuel_id = #{fuelId}

UPDATE TB_OIL_MST_DETAIL SET api_grv = #{apiGrv}, sulfur_p_cnt = #{sulfurPCnt}, flash_pnt = #{flashPnt}, viscosity = #{viscosity}, density_15c = #{density15c}, fuel_memo = #{fuelMemo}, use_yn = #{useYn}, upd_dtime = CURRENT_TIMESTAMP, upd_id = #{updId} WHERE fuel_id = #{fuelId}
UPDATE TB_OIL_MST SET use_yn = #{useYn}, upd_dtime = CURRENT_TIMESTAMP, upd_id = #{updId} WHERE fuel_id = #{fuelId}
UPDATE TB_OIL_MST_DETAIL SET use_yn = #{useYn}, upd_dtime = CURRENT_TIMESTAMP, upd_id = #{updId} WHERE fuel_id = #{fuelId}
